LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Acid.label: arm implant - Sting(Acid)
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Acid.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical sting installing into arm. Charged with Acid damage.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Cryo.label: arm implant - Sting(Cryo)
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Cryo.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical sting installing into arm. Charged with Cryo damage.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Fire.label: arm implant - Sting(Fire)
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_Fire.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical sting installing into arm. Charged with Fire damage.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_EMP.label: arm implant - Sting(EMP)
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Sting_EMP.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical sting installing into arm. Charged with EMP damage.\n\nWarning! EMP damage isn't intended to destroy meatbags.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Demolisher.label: arm implant - Demolisher
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Demolisher.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical drill installing into arm. Designed for breaching.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Assassin.label: arm implant - Assassin
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Assassin.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical knife installing into arm. Designed for armor penetration.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Duelist.label: arm implant - Duelist
LanguageData.OE_ImplantArm_Duelist.description: Obsidia arm implant combat-oriented mechanical fist installing into arm. Designed for stunning.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Builder.label: hand implant - Builder
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Builder.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for improvements building and construction skills.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Agronomist.label: hand implant - Agronomist
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Agronomist.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for improvements animal and plant skills.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Doctor.label: hand implant - Doctor
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Doctor.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for improvements medical and intellectual.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Harvester.label: hand implant - Harvester
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Harvester.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for increase gather yield.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Soldier.label: hand implant - Soldier
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Soldier.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for improvements melee and shooting skills.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Psy.label: hand implant - Psy
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHand_Psy.description: Obsidia hand implant non-combat-oriented mechanical hand replacement for improvements psychic powers.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLeg_Ninja.label: leg implant - Ninja
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLeg_Ninja.description: Obsidia leg implant non-combat-oriented mechanical leg replacement for improvements stealth abilities.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_Obsidian.label: skin implant - Obsidian
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_Obsidian.description: Obsidia skin implant releases chemicals and nanomachines that toughen the skin and add flexible subdermal obsidian plates at strategic points. This makes the user more resistant to damage across their whole body.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_Mythril.label: skin implant - Mythril
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_Mythril.description: Obsidia skin implant releases chemicals and nanomachines that toughen the skin and add flexible subdermal mythril plates at strategic points. This makes the user more resistant to damage across their whole body.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_CAC.label: skin implant - Cultist
LanguageData.OE_ImplantSkin_CAC.description: Obsidia cultist skin implant releases chemicals and nanomachines that toughen the skin and add flexible subdermal empyrium and orichalcum plates at strategic points. This makes the user more resistant to damage across their whole body.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantTorso_Interface.label: cyberware interface
LanguageData.OE_ImplantTorso_Interface.description: Obsidia cyberware interface system is installed in the body with a low-intelligent microcomputer controlled by a neural interface. Required for further installation of cyberware modules.
LanguageData.EGO_ImplantTorso_Interface.label: symbiont
LanguageData.EGO_ImplantTorso_Interface.description: Symbiont is an organically integrated system implanted into the body, serving as a foundation for further mutations. It bonds with the host’s body, creating a seamless neural interface that enhances the integration of Mutations.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Psydeaf.label: brain implant - Psychically deaf
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Psydeaf.description: Obsidia psychically deaf brain implant was designed to suppress psy-sensitivity.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Prisoner.label: brain implant - Suppression
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Prisoner.description: Obsidia suppression brain implant was designed to subdue rebellious slaves without harming them, also improves their behavior and reduces their need for sleep. When hit by an EMP it will knock the host unconscious.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Slave.label: brain implant - Sacrifice
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Slave.description: Obsidia Sacrifice brain implant was designed to fully paralysis, making it impossible to move.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Interface.label: cyberware AI interface
LanguageData.OE_ImplantBrain_Interface.description: Obsidia cyberware AI interface system is installed in the brain with a low-intelligent microcomputer controlled by a neural interface. Required for further installation of cyberware AI helpers.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantStomach_Traveler.label: stomach implant - Traveler
LanguageData.OE_ImplantStomach_Traveler.description: Obsidia traveler stomach implant was designed to additional nutrition while traveling by caravan.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHeart_Healing.label: heart implant - Healing
LanguageData.OE_ImplantHeart_Healing.description: Obsidia healing heart implant was designed to releases nanomachines and healing factors that speed up wound healing.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantKidney_Coagulator.label: kidney implant - Coagulator
LanguageData.OE_ImplantKidney_Coagulator.description: Obsidia coagulator kidney implant was designed to releases nanomachines and coagulating factors in response to blood loss, reducing bleeding rates significantly.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLiver_Antibiotic.label: liver implant - Immune assistant
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLiver_Antibiotic.description: Obsidia immune assistant liver implant was designed to speed up gains immunity to diseases.
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLung_Filtration.label: lung implant - Antitox-filter
LanguageData.OE_ImplantLung_Filtration.description: Obsidia antitox-filter lung implant was designed to reduce the intake of environmental toxins, allowing the user to survive longer in polluted environments. Additionally, it negates the irritation of acidic smoke and prevents lung rot in this lung.
